# Carlos Garita Campos - Full Stack Developer Portfolio

> Full-stack engineer with a robust foundation in computer science, specializing in architecting and delivering comprehensive software solutions. Expert in developing responsive user interfaces, designing robust back-end services, managing databases, and deploying applications in cloud environments.

## About

- **Name**: Carlos Garita Campos
- **Role**: Full Stack Developer
- **Location**: Costa Rica
- **Website**: https://cgarita.web.app
- **Email**: cgaritac@gmail.com
- **LinkedIn**: https://www.linkedin.com/in/carlos-garita-campos-44881a111
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/cgaritac

## Technical Skills

### Frontend
- React JS, Angular, TypeScript, JavaScript
- HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS
- Storybook, Single-SPA (Microfrontends)
- Feature-Sliced Design (FSD) Architecture

### Backend
- C#, .NET, Python, Java
- Node.js, Docker

### Databases
- SQL Server, MySQL

### Cloud & DevOps
- Microsoft Azure, Azure AD (Microsoft Entra ID)
- CI/CD Pipelines, Git

## Work Experience

### Factor K (July 2024 – Present)
- Develop and maintain web applications following SCRUM methodology
- Implement front-end solutions using JavaScript, Angular, and React with FSD architecture
- Build and integrate microfrontend architectures using single-spa
- Integrate authentication systems with Microsoft Entra ID and Clerk
- Develop back-end services with C#, .NET, and Docker
- Configure and maintain CI/CD pipelines in Microsoft Azure
- Design and update MySQL databases
- Analyze Pull Requests as Developer Lead

### Critical Mass (July 2023 – October 2023)
- Executed authoring tasks in Adobe Experience Manager (AEM)
- Customized AEM components using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
- Conducted content validation, functional testing, and accessibility checks

### Sibu Digital (April 2023 – June 2023)
- Performed AEM authoring activities
- Managed digital assets within AEM DAM
- Collaborated with designers and developers on responsive design

## Featured Projects

### UI Component Library
A collection of reusable UI components for web applications built with React and CSS, using Storybook for documentation and testing.
- **Technologies**: React, Storybook, CSS
- **Repository**: https://github.com/cgaritac/ui_library

### Expropriation Management System
A web application that enables users to manage the expropriation process.
- **Technologies**: C#, .NET, Blazor, SQL Server
- **Repository**: https://github.com/cgaritac/expropriation_management_system

### Performance Evaluation System (Full Stack)
A web application that enables companies to manage the performance evaluation process.
- **Frontend**: React, Tailwind CSS - https://github.com/cgaritac/performance_evaluation_system_FE
- **Backend**: C#, .NET, MySQL - https://github.com/cgaritac/performance_evaluation_system_BE

### Helicopter Game
A game where a vessel tries to avoid crashing into obstacles.
- **Technologies**: Python, Pygame
- **Repository**: https://github.com/cgaritac/helicopter_game

### Airplane Passengers
A project that simulates the registration of passengers for an airline.
- **Technologies**: Java, Swing
- **Repository**: https://github.com/cgaritac/airplane_passengers

- Frontend Development

- Database Administration
